Author: sugarxxfree
Text: Yeah. When ever I binge, if I drink water it literally feels like my stomach is ripping open. Alternatively, if I decide to purge I will drink tons of water to get it out easier. So it's either one or the other for me. I hate the feeling of cold liquid coming back up though.
